Aadhaar Banking / Cash-out

AePS - Aadhaar Enabled Payment System

A simple and highly secure cash withdrawing ability for your customers using Aadhaar and ensuring that you earn more with every transaction.

Try for free
Learn more



Earn with Aadhaar Banking (AePS)

Turn your shop into an ATM


Aadhar banking (AePS) helps you turn your own shop into an ATM. It provides you the ability to deliver services such as cash deposit, cash withdrawal, and balance check to your customers. This is particularly useful for customers who do not trust themselves to be able to use an ATM properly. Help them out, help yourself out!



Easy Cash Withdrawal

AePS allows you to turn your shop into an ATM and lets your customers withdraw cash using their fingerprint.



Jan Dhan Government Benefit

AePS allows your customers to withdraw their DBT (Direct Benefit Transfers) from government in their Jan Dhan account.



Easy Cash Deposit

AePS also allows you to turn your shop into a cash deposit machine. Your customers can then deposit cash at your shop with ease.

Quick Fund Transfer

With AePS you will never have to go to a Bank or an ATM and you will not need a debit card also. Just transfer funds using your fingerprint.

Instant Balance-inquiry

AePS allows your customers to check their bank balance at your shop instantly.

Mini Statement

AePS will also let your customers take the mini statement of their account at your shop



Benefits

Earn Commission

Earn commission for every cash-deposit, cash-withdrawal or balance-inquiry that your customer does at your shop. More transaction is more commission for you.

Best Success Rate

Transaction failures occur rarely with our services. We ensure that you get the best success rate for every transaction. We are as reliable as banks themselves



Eko's Trust

You can assure your customers that their money and data is safe. Ekoâ€™s trust is unparalleled



How to use Aadhaar Banking



Step 1:

Sign Up on Connect

https://connect.eko.in/

Step 2:

Enable AePS using the Connect app

Step 3:

Register your biometric device

Step 4:

Start serving your customers



A customer who wishes to use your service would simply need to provide his aadhar number, name, and account number.


The process to enable AePS and register your biometric device is easy.

For all issues, we provide 24x7 support.
